claim: R. Madhavan was in the cast of the comedy 3 Idiots.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In the mid-2000s , Madhavan also actively pursued a career in Hindi films , by appearing in supporting roles in three highly successful productions , Rakeysh Omprakash Mehra 's Rang De Basanti  (  2006  )  , Mani Ratnam 's biopic Guru  (  2007  )  and Rajkumar Hirani 's 3 Idiots  (  2009  )  , which went on to become the highest grossing Indian film of all time upon release .
